file_content.text: With those cannons gone, CorSec can finally torch the blasted Imps off our world.
CorSec's already on the move. With those cannons down and the Imp lines broken, you gave us plenty of room to maneuver.
It's gonna be a hot time in Uptown Sector tonight. The Empire will wish it never came here.
Your team's done its part. Leave the cleanup to us. For Corellia!
I won't ask any more of you, Master Jedi. This is our fight now. For Corellia!
I know Havoc Squad's needed elsewhere, sir. Leave the mop-up to my people. For Corellia!
Don't need Jedi when people like you are around. We'll win this war yet. For Corellia!
If you take out those cannons and clear us a path, I guarantee CorSec will finish the job.
Blasted Imps! We'll die before we give up Corellia! You hear me, you scum?
Watch yourselves here, people--the Empire's hitting this position with mortar cannons.
This position's not secure, Master Jedi. The Empire's mortar cannons are blasting everything in sight.
I recommend you fall back, sir. The Empire's pounding the sector with mortar cannons.
Unless you want to wind up as little pieces all over the sector, run. The Empire's mortar cannons are making short work of tourists.
I'm leading CorSec commandos to push back Imperial forces, but they're dug in with heavy artillery support. We're getting our tails handed to us.
The enemy will kill everyone unless you hold the line.
We must drive back the Empire.
Do not let fear guide you, Sergeant. Now is the time for courage, resolve and sacrifice.
Focus on victory.
Fight harder, Sergeant. Make those casualties mean something.
Never surrender.
Sounds to me like the Empire needs a big taste of its own medicine.
So return the favor.
Then why stay in the sector?
Retreat's not an option. We'll burn the Empire off Corellia like a sand tick from a bantha--or die trying.
You're obviously inept.
CorSec's Tactical Response Teams are the best. My people are giving their lives to burn the Empire out of here.
Republic High Command is rallying forces to take back this sector, and CorSec's doing its part. We're just not equipped to handle heavy artillery.
Your team looks like it could handle anything. If you can disable those mortar cannons and crack the Empire's forward lines, we'll do the rest.
We'll give it our best shot.
We're too busy. [Refuse quest]
A Jedi, on the other hand... you could shut down those mortar cannons and punch us an opening through the Empire's forces.
I know Havoc Squad's reputation, sir. You can knock out those mortar cannons and punch a hole in the Empire's forward lines.
What we need is heavy artillery of our own. Something to knock out those mortar cannons and scatter the Empire's forward lines.
The Empire won't hold this sector--not if I have anything to say about it.
I'll give it my best.
Sounds like a noble cause.
I'll tell my men reinforcements have arrived. Report back when it's safe to move out. Good luck.
Knowing the Jedi are on our side will give us hope to keep fighting. Let me know when the way is open.
When I tell the men Havoc Squad is with us, it'll raise morale a thousand percent. Report in when our path is clear, sir.
You're either brave or just crazy, but who cares? We'll take all the help we can get. I'll be waiting to hear from you.
I'm too busy. [Refuse quest]
Maybe we can hold out long enough for real reinforcements to arrive. Good luck out there.
CorSec will burn the Empire off Corellia one soldier at a time if we have to.
